description:

Size: 2 3/4 inches tall

Autographed

description:
Learn how to find true love with this original Dilworth-ian creation. Adapted from the animated short, "Rinky Dink", you'll treasure each page of this unconventional story of the search for true love. A perfect gift to share with a naughty lover.

60 pages. 6 inches tall x 9 inches wide. Softcover. Saddle Stitch. Gloss Finish.

Autographed

name: THE ANIMATED FILMS of JOHN R. DILWORTH - Special Collector’s DVD
description:
Personally autographed by the director. 11 of John Dilworth’s most admired films including:

LIFE IN TRANSITION (4:10) Best in Show, ASIFA-East Animation Festival, New York City, USA
 
CATCH OF THE DAY (8:47) Children’s Jury Award for Best Animation, Festival Internacional de Cine Infantil, Chile 

THE DIRDY BIRDY (7:14) Audience Prize for Favorite Film, Zagreb World Festival of Animated Films, Zagreb, Croatia 

NOODLES & NEDD (7:44) 2nd Prize, Animation, Children’s Jury, Chicago International Children’s Film Festival, Chicago, USA

THE MOUSOCHIST (4:00) Best of Show, ASIFA-East Animation Festival, New York City, USA 

INCLUDING A SURPRISE BONUS SHORT THAT SHOULDN’T BE MISSED!

-----------------------------

name: ORIGINAL PRODUCTION ART FROM "THE DIRDY BIRDY"
description:
Own the original production cels and original color xerox background of the underground cult classic, "THE DIRDY BIRDY". 
The film was invited to over 100 international festivals and has won numerous prizes. THE DIRDY BIRDY has toured with Spike & Mike’s “Festival of Animation” and “Sick & Twisted Festival,  and the ”LOLLAPALOOZA SUMMER TOUR music festival, and opened for several feature films, among them, "CRUMB."  The Venice Film Festival and the Zagreb film Festival have placed a 35 mm print in their permanent archive. The film was featured on MTV’s debut of “Cartoon Sushi,” and as a broadband series on Comedy Central’s website, Motherload.

Hand inked/xerox pen on clear acetate with hand painted acrylic paint on the reverse. 

12.5 inches x 10 inches.

Autographed 

If you would like to see additional art from this film or request a specific frame write me at info@stretchfilms.com

NOTE: Images are cropped to fit. The original art size is much larger. 

-----------------------------

All sales final except for manufacturer damage. Does not include shipping costs or taxes. Allow 1-2 weeks for processing.

All products Copyright 2010 John R. Dliworth

name: ORIGINAL PRODUCTION ART FROM "LIFE IN TRANSITION"
description:
Own the original production drawings from the multi-award winning short film, "LIFE IN TRANSITION". 
Best of Show at the ASIFA-East Animation Festival, Maverick Award for Best Animation at Woodstock Film Festival, and Nominated for an Annie Award for Best Animated Short among others. The film was selected for the 2005 tour “Animation Show of Shows,” the best of contemporary international animation.

Graphite on paper.

8.5 inches x 11 inches.

Autographed.

If you would like to see additional art from this film or request a specific frame write me at info@stretchfilms.com

name: ORIGINAL PRODUCTION ART FROM "THE MOUSOCHIST"
description:
Own the original production drawings from the award winning short film, 
"THE MOUSOCHIST". 
The film won Best of Show at the ASIFA-EAST Animation Festival in New York City, Best Film at the Marira Film Festival in Italy, and a Bronze Award at the Kalamazoo Animation Festival in Michigan. THE MOUSOCHIST was selected in Caroline’s on Broadway Funny Short Film Festival, winning second prize, and “Avoid Eye Contact” volume Two, "The Best of New York Independent Animation."

Pen on paper.

5 5/8  inches x 4 inches.

Autographed.

If you would like to see additional art from this film or request a specific frame write me at info@stretchfilms.com

name: ORIGINAL PRODUCTION ART FROM "THE RETURN OF SERGEANT PECKER"
description:
Own the original production drawings from the infamous erotic comedy, 
"THE RETURN OF SERGEANT PECKER". John Dilworth made this scandalous short film under the nom d'animation, "Pierre Delarue". The film has screened in many film festivals around the world including the Annecy Film Festival, France.

View the film at: 
www.thereturnofsergeantpecker.com

A perfect gift as a sentiment card, "thinking of you". Send to a special lover or pervert. 

Graphite on Bristol.

6.5 inches x 4 1/4 inches.

Autographed by "Pierre Delarue".
